remarks: Deduction for a module homomorphism.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Feb-2015.)
statement:
islmhmd.x $e |- X = ( Base ` S ) $.
islmhmd.a $e |- .x. = ( .s ` S ) $.
islmhmd.b $e |- .X. = ( .s ` T ) $.
islmhmd.k $e |- K = ( Scalar ` S ) $.
islmhmd.j $e |- J = ( Scalar ` T ) $.
islmhmd.n $e |- N = ( Base ` K ) $.
islmhmd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. LMod ) $.
islmhmd.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. LMod ) $.
islmhmd.c $e |- ( ph -> J = K ) $.
islmhmd.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) $.
islmhmd.l $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. N /\ y e. X ) ) -> ( F ` ( x .x. y ) ) = ( x .X. ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
islmhmd $p |- ( ph -> F e. ( S LMHom T ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
